Package server.parsing

Class ParserFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • server.parsing.ParserFactory
  • public final class ParserFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    A parser factory

    It currently supports CSV, TSV parsers and parsers for delimited text with custom delimiters

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  ParserFactory.ParserType
      Regulates which of all the possible implementations of IParser to use

    • Method Detail

      • create

        public static final IParser create​(ParserFactory.ParserType parserType)
        Returns a new concrete implementation of IParser
        Parameters:
        parserType - regulates which concrete class to use
        Returns:

      • createCustomDelimitedTxtParser

        public static final IParser createCustomDelimitedTxtParser​(java.lang.String delimiter)
        Constructs a DelimitedTxtParser with a user-specified delimiter
        Parameters:
        delimiter - the delimiter to use
        Returns:

      • guessDelimiterFromFileExtension

        public static final java.util.Optional<ParserFactory.ParserType> guessDelimiterFromFileExtension​(java.nio.file.Path file)
        Guesses the parser type needed based on the extension of a file

        Only "*.csv" and "*.tsv" files are currently supported.

        Parameters:
        file - the file to guess
        Returns:
        the delimiter
